entry.title: Sunday: Periods of drizzle. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of drizzle or flurries near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle near noon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle or flurries early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning early in the morning and ending near noon then 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
